title: Earring
description: Gold earring. Loop: a gold hook with free end pointing down. To front face is soldered an openwork rosette enframing a circular setting (empty) below, an openwork bar in form of 2  adossed dolphins; 3 pendants with red stones in circular box settings, iridescent globular glass beads.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

For more information about the Museum's rights project, including how rights types are assigned, please see our blog posts on copyright. If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.
